Strings.Text: \nIt's an old typewriter.{clear 0}If I had an {color 1}Ink Ribbon{color 0}, I\ncould save my progress...
\nThe desk is locked.{clear 0}Will you use the {color 1}{string 0}{color 0}?\n{branch 0}
Doors can be unlocked\nby a card key.
\nIt's locked.{clear 0}A spade is etched under\nthe key hole.
\nIt's locked.{clear 0}A diamond is etched under\nthe key hole.
\nIt's locked.{clear 0}A heart is etched under\nthe key hole.
\nIt's locked.{clear 0}A club is etched under\nthe key hole.
The door is opened with a\ncard key.
\nIt's locked.{clear 0}It's a keyhole for the\n{color 1}Master Key{color 0}.
